mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT a.* FROM sys_menu a LEFT JOIN sys_menu p ON p.id = a.pid JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON rm.sys_menu_id = a.id JOIN sys_role r ON r.id = rm.sys_role_id JOIN sys_user_role ur ON ur.sys_role_id = r.id JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = ur.sys_user_id AND u.username = #{username} order by id asc
